description: A port city on the coast of Arabasta Kingdom, known for its perfume trade. The city features architecture inspired by ancient Egypt and serves as a major entry point to the kingdom. During the civil war, it became a target for pirates taking advantage of the chaos.

keyEvents.title: Puppu Pirates Terrorize Nanohana
keyEvents.description: Pirate captain Puppu and his crew are shown looting and pillaging Nanohana, taking advantage of the civil war chaos in Arabasta.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Nanohana as a location under threat and sets up the need for intervention.

keyEvents.title: Crocodile Appears as Arabasta's Hero
keyEvents.description: Crocodile appears on a rooftop in Nanohana, recognized by the townspeople as one of the Seven Warlords and their protector.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Crocodile's public hero image in Arabasta, central to the arc's conspiracy.

keyEvents.title: Crocodile Defeats Puppu Pirates
keyEvents.description: Crocodile uses his Suna Suna no Mi powers to create a sand twister that dehydrates and kills Puppu and his entire crew, 'saving' Nanohana from the pirates.
keyEvents.significance: First major display of Crocodile's deadly powers and reinforcement of his hero status among the people.

statusHistory.reason: Port city continues to operate despite civil war tensions

name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted by Kaya. In this episode, it serves as the location where the crew meets Mr. 2 and approaches the coast of Arabasta.

keyEvents.title: Mr. 2 Rescued on the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats accidentally catch and rescue Mr. 2 Bon Kurei from drowning while fishing from the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: The Going Merry becomes the site of the fateful first meeting between the Straw Hats and Mr. 2.

keyEvents.title: Mane Mane no Mi Demonstration on Deck
keyEvents.description: Mr. 2 demonstrates his copying abilities on the deck of the Going Merry, transforming into various crew members.
keyEvents.significance: The ship's deck serves as the stage for the revelation of Mr. 2's dangerous Devil Fruit powers.

keyEvents.title: Approaching Arabasta Coast
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry approaches the coast of Arabasta, bringing the crew to the kingdom that will be the setting for a major arc.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the arrival at Arabasta, beginning one of One Piece's most important story arcs.
